## Visualizations

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
sleep <- read_csv("sleep.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(sleep)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = sleep, 
       mapping = aes(x = `Physical Activity Level`, y = `Sleep Duration`, colour = Occupation)) + geom_point()
```
